attributes.action: investigate the denial of Midland Mainline's rail franchise with a view to overturning the decision.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Midland Mainline's standards of service has been good compared to other operators.  Punctuality, reliability and customer satisfaction have all been better than rival operators including the franchise winner. And they provide free tea and coffee.

Surely it is the worst performers that should be losing their franchises, not the best, if passengers matter at all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
